    include-in-header:
      - text: |
          <script>
          // Fix for base64-encoded category URLs
          (function() {
            'use strict';
            function decodeCategory(categoryValue) {
              if (!categoryValue) return categoryValue;
              let decoded = categoryValue;
              try {
                decoded = decodeURIComponent(categoryValue);
              } catch (e) {
                decoded = categoryValue;
              }
              const looksLikeBase64 = !/[\s]/.test(decoded) && 
                                      /^[A-Za-z0-9+/]*={0,2}$/.test(decoded) && 
                                      decoded.length >= 4;
              if (looksLikeBase64) {
                try {
                  const base64Decoded = atob(decoded);
                  if (/^[\x20-\x7E\s]*$/.test(base64Decoded) && base64Decoded.length > 0) {
                    return base64Decoded;
                  }
                } catch (e) {}
              }
              return decoded;
            }
            
            // Intercept quarto-listing-loaded to fix hash before processing
            const originalLoaded = window['quarto-listing-loaded'];
            window['quarto-listing-loaded'] = function() {
              // Fix hash in URL first
              const hash = window.location.hash;
              if (hash && hash.includes('category=')) {
                const match = hash.match(/category=([^&]*)/);
                if (match) {
                  const decoded = decodeCategory(match[1]);
                  if (decoded !== match[1] && decoded !== match[1].replace(/%3D/g, '=')) {
                    const newHash = hash.replace(/category=[^&]*/, 'category=' + encodeURIComponent(decoded));
                    window.history.replaceState(null, null, newHash);
                  }
                }
              }
              // Call original
              if (originalLoaded) originalLoaded();
              // Re-trigger with fixed hash
              setTimeout(function() {
                const hash = window.location.hash;
                if (hash) {
                  const match = hash.match(/category=([^&]*)/);
                  if (match) {
                    const category = decodeURIComponent(match[1]);
                    if (window.quartoListingCategory) {
                      window.quartoListingCategory(category);
                    }
                  }
                }
              }, 100);
            };
            
            // Fix hash immediately on load
            function fixHash() {
              const hash = window.location.hash;
              if (hash && hash.includes('category=')) {
                const match = hash.match(/category=([^&]*)/);
                if (match) {
                  const decoded = decodeCategory(match[1]);
                  if (decoded !== match[1] && decoded !== match[1].replace(/%3D/g, '=')) {
                    const newHash = hash.replace(/category=[^&]*/, 'category=' + encodeURIComponent(decoded));
                    window.history.replaceState(null, null, newHash);
                  }
                }
              }
            }
            
            if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
              document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', fixHash);
            } else {
              fixHash();
            }
            window.addEventListener('hashchange', fixHash);
          })();
          </script>
